Text: when will the full game be here love games like this

The demo is 6 months.

If you go to the championship manager site you get the games on release date for 2.50 gbp.

You have to download on the day of release.

yeah i will be paying for this game, had all the other cm games, im a big fan, + i want to play this with mates online to, this shouldnt be like most games out there that you play for 6 hours complete it and never look at it again, im proud to put this on my paid for shelf allong side other greats like nwn bioshock oblivion and fallout 3. not many i know, but i only pay for quality. hahaha :)
